patchNotes.title: New in {{version}}
patchNotes.subtitle: This version brings a brand new MySK experience.

list.1: Student List Printout: Get a fully customizable name list printout of your students in both Thai and English
list.2: Save all your students/classmates’ contacts to your phone in just one click

credits.supervisors: MySK is supervised by Supannee Supeerath and Atipol Sukrisadanon.
credits.developers: Its development was led by Siravit Phokeed and Smart Wattanapornmongkol with help from Sadudee Theparree and Tempoom Leelacharoen.
credits.translations: Translations to Thai contributed by Suankularb English Club.
